entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 40%
